Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 131st/Evans
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 130th, Ellis and 131st due to street blockage near 131st/Evans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 130th, Ellis and 131st due to street blockage near 131st/Evans.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Loyola
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Loyola due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Loyola due to a mechanical problem. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
